languages.text: Таинственный глава культа Последнего восхода, второй из носящих имя Заря, намеревается уничтожить все шаттлы, дабы не позволить никому покинуть Райкад Минорис. Каждый уничтоженный им шаттл — это сотни людей, которые не успеют спастись с планеты, пожираемой Архиврагом.

A mysterious leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the second person to bear the name of Aurora, intends to destroy all the shuttles so no one can leave Rykad Minoris. Every shuttle destroyed by him equals hundreds of people unable to escape the planet slowly being devoured by the Ruinous Powers.
languages.original_text: Таинственный глава культа Последнего восхода, второй из носящих имя Заря, намеревается уничтожить все шаттлы, дабы не позволить никому покинуть Райкад Минорис. Каждый уничтоженный им шаттл — это сотни людей, которые не успеют спастись с планеты, пожираемой Архиврагом.

traits.locale_text: A mysterious leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the second person to bear the name of Aurora, intends to destroy all the shuttles, so no one can leave Rykad Minoris. Every shuttle destroyed by him equals hundreds of lives unable to escape the planet slowly devoured by the Ruinous Powers.

A mysterious leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the second person to bear the name of Aurora, intends to destroy all the shuttles so no one can leave Rykad Minoris. Every shuttle destroyed by him equals hundreds of people unable to escape the planet slowly being devoured by the Ruinous Powers.

A mysterious leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the second person to bear the name of Aurora, intends to destroy all the shuttles so no one can leave Rykad Minoris. Every shuttle destroyed by him equals hundreds of people unable to escape the planet slowly being devoured by the Ruinous Powers.

languages.text: Ein geheimnisvoller Anführer des Kults der letzten Dämmerung und die zweite Person, die den Namen Aurora führt, will alle Shuttles zerstören, damit niemand Rykad Minoris verlassen kann. Jedes zerstörte Shuttle bedeutet, dass Hunderte von Menschen nicht von dem Planeten entkommen können, der langsam von den Mächten der Zerstörung verschlungen wird.
languages.original_text: A mysterious leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the second person to bear the name of Aurora, intends to destroy all the shuttles so no one can leave Rykad Minoris. Every shuttle destroyed by him equals hundreds of people unable to escape the planet slowly being devoured by the Ruinous Powers.

traits.locale_text: Ein geheimnisvoller Anführer des Kults der letzten Dämmerung und die zweite Person, die den Namen Aurora führt, will alle Shuttles zerstören, damit niemand Rykad Minoris verlassen kann. Jedes zerstörte Shuttle bedeutet, dass Hunderte von Menschen nicht von dem Planeten entkommen können, der langsam von den Mächten der Zerstörung verschlungen wird.

languages.text: Le mystérieux chef du Culte de l'Aube finale, la deuxième personne à porter le nom d'Aurore, compte détruire toutes les navettes afin que nul ne puisse quitter Rykad Minoris. Pour chaque transport qu'il neutralise, ce sont des centaines de personnes qui se retrouvent dans l'impossibilité de quitter la planète lentement dévorée par les Puissances de la Ruine.
languages.original_text: A mysterious leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the second person to bear the name of Aurora, intends to destroy all the shuttles so no one can leave Rykad Minoris. Every shuttle destroyed by him equals hundreds of people unable to escape the planet slowly being devoured by the Ruinous Powers.

traits.locale_text: Le mystérieux chef du Culte de l'Aube finale, la deuxième personne à porter le nom d'Aurore, compte détruire toutes les navettes afin que nul ne puisse quitter Rykad Minoris. Pour chaque transport qu'il neutralise, ce sont des centaines de personnes qui se retrouvent dans l'impossibilité de quitter la planète lentement dévorée par les Puissances de la Ruine.

languages.text: 最後の夜明け教団の謎の指導者であり、オーロラの名を持つ2人目の人物がすべてのシャトルを破壊し、誰一人としてライカド・ミノリスから脱出できないようにしようとしている。彼によって破壊されるシャトル1機につき何百人もの人々が惑星に残され、禍つ神々によって命を奪われることになるのだ。
languages.original_text: A mysterious leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the second person to bear the name of Aurora, intends to destroy all the shuttles so no one can leave Rykad Minoris. Every shuttle destroyed by him equals hundreds of people unable to escape the planet slowly being devoured by the Ruinous Powers.

traits.locale_text: 最後の夜明け教団の謎の指導者であり、オーロラの名を持つ2人目の人物がすべてのシャトルを破壊し、誰一人としてライカド・ミノリスから脱出できないようにしようとしている。彼によって破壊されるシャトル1機につき何百人もの人々が惑星に残され、禍つ神々によって命を奪われることになるのだ。

languages.text: Un líder misterioso del Culto del Amanecer Final, la segunda persona que adopta el nombre de Aurora, tiene intención de destruir todas las lanzaderas para que nadie salga de Rykad Minoris. Cada lanzadera que destruye significa que cientos de personas quedan atrapadas en un planeta que está siendo devorado por los Poderes Ruinosos.
languages.original_text: A mysterious leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the second person to bear the name of Aurora, intends to destroy all the shuttles so no one can leave Rykad Minoris. Every shuttle destroyed by him equals hundreds of people unable to escape the planet slowly being devoured by the Ruinous Powers.

traits.locale_text: Un líder misterioso del Culto del Amanecer Final, la segunda persona que adopta el nombre de Aurora, tiene intención de destruir todas las lanzaderas para que nadie salga de Rykad Minoris. Cada lanzadera que destruye significa que cientos de personas quedan atrapadas en un planeta que está siendo devorado por los Poderes Ruinosos.

languages.text: “终末黎明”的神秘领袖，又一个自称“极光”的人，打算摧毁所有的穿梭机，这样就没人能离开小莱卡德了。每有一架穿梭机遭到摧毁，就相当于几百人失去了逃离行星的希望，只能慢慢地被毁灭之力吞噬。
languages.original_text: A mysterious leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the second person to bear the name of Aurora, intends to destroy all the shuttles so no one can leave Rykad Minoris. Every shuttle destroyed by him equals hundreds of people unable to escape the planet slowly being devoured by the Ruinous Powers.

traits.locale_text: “终末黎明”的神秘领袖，又一个自称“极光”的人，打算摧毁所有的穿梭机，这样就没人能离开小莱卡德了。每有一架穿梭机遭到摧毁，就相当于几百人失去了逃离行星的希望，只能慢慢地被毁灭之力吞噬。

languages.text: Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın esrarengiz bir lideri ve Aurora isminin ikinci sahibi, kimse Rykad'ı terk edemesin diye bütün mekikleri imha etme niyetinde. Onun tarafından iş göremez hâle getirilen her mekik, Yıkıcı Güçler'in yavaşça yiyip bitirdiği gezegenden kaçamayacak olan yüzlerce insan anlamına geliyor.
languages.original_text: A mysterious leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn, the second person to bear the name of Aurora, intends to destroy all the shuttles so no one can leave Rykad Minoris. Every shuttle destroyed by him equals hundreds of people unable to escape the planet slowly being devoured by the Ruinous Powers.

traits.locale_text: Nihai Şafak tarikatı'nın esrarengiz bir lideri ve Aurora isminin ikinci sahibi, kimse Rykad'ı terk edemesin diye bütün mekikleri imha etme niyetinde. Onun tarafından iş göremez hâle getirilen her mekik, yıkıcı güçlerin yavaşça yiyip bitirdiği gezegenden kaçamayacak olan yüzlerce insan anlamına geliyor.
